name: Dynasty Cream
description: Meet the 'Dynasty Cream,' our very first product here at Beauty of Joseon, and a long-time favorite of many of our customers. Its firm and creamy texture gives your skin deep, long-lasting moisture and nourishment. This all-in-one cream is filled with good-for-skin ingredients like rice bran water, ginseng water, squalane, and niacinamide. These ingredients help to keep your skin healthy, hydrated, and balanced. Its firm texture sinks into your skin, providing moisture and nourishment from deep within.
KeyIngredient: Rice bran water 29%, Ginseng root water 5%, Squalane 2%, Niacinamide 2%

name: Water Bank Moisture Cream
description: A rich moisturizer that delivers long-lasting hydration, formulated with hydro ionized mineral water to deeply hydrate and strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier.
KeyIngredient: Hydro Ionized Mineral Water, Green Mineral Water, Glycerin

name: Propolis Vitamin Sleeping Mask
description: A nourishing sleeping mask that revitalizes the skin overnight with propolis extract and vitamin E, leaving it hydrated and glowing.
KeyIngredient: Propolis Extract 87.26%, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate

name: Ultra Facial Cream
description: A 24-hour, light-textured daily hydrator that leaves skin feeling comfortable and visibly well-balanced, particularly in harsh weather conditions.
KeyIngredient: Squalane, Glacial Glycoprotein, Imperata Cylindrica Root Extract

name: Cica Cream
description: A fast-acting cream that calms sensitive skin, formulated with Centella Asiatica complex to soothe and hydrate irritated skin.
KeyIngredient: Centella Asiatica Extract, Niacinamide, Glycerin

name: Green Tea Balancing Cream
description: A lightweight gel-cream that replenishes moisture and soothes the skin with Jeju green tea extract.
KeyIngredient: Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycerin, Stearic Acid

name: Moisture Surge 72-Hour Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
description: An enhanced moisture boost that works non-stop for 72 hours, even after washing your face, to keep skin almost twice as hydrated at the end of the day.
KeyIngredient: Aloe Vera Bioferment, Hyaluronic Acid, Activated Aloe Water

name: Intensive Vitalizing Cream EX
description: A rich anti-aging cream that revitalizes skin, improves resilience, and strengthens the skin barrier, leaving it firm and smooth.
KeyIngredient: Ginseng Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract

name: Rich Moist Soothing Cream
description: A rich cream that provides soothing moisture for sensitive skin, formulated with shea butter and ceramides to strengthen the skin barrier.
KeyIngredient: Shea Butter, Ceramide NP, Jojoba Seed Oil

name: Perfect Renew Regenerating Cream
description: An anti-aging cream that provides deep hydration and revitalization, improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
KeyIngredient: Squalane, Hydrolyzed Lupine Protein, Glycerin

name: Isntree Hyaluronic Acid moist Cream
description: ISNTREE Hyaluronic Acid Moist Cream is formulated maily with Hyaluronic Acid and botanic oils that moisturizes your skin and replenishes nutrients for skin deficiencies. This cream is has some viscosity that it covers your skin gently. Suitable for all skin types, ideal for dry and sensitive skin types.
KeyIngredient: Antioxidant · Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil · Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil · Pteris Multifida Extract

name: SKIN1004 Madagascar Centella Hyalu-Cica Moisture Cream 75ml
description: HIGHLY MOISTURIZING + HIGHLY SOOTHING 100 HOURS MOISTURE CREAM Powerful soothing care with Centella Asiatica extract from Madagascar. Hydrating Plant-Based collagen, Phyto collagen.
KeyIngredient: Centella Asiatica Extract(92%), Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Water, Hydroxyacetophenone, Carbomer, Glycereth-25 PCA Isostearate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tromethamine, Sodium Hyaluronate(100.5ppm)

name: Cosrx AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer
description: For your acne prone skin! A lightweight facial moisturizer for acne prone skin and able to keep your skin balanced.
KeyIngredient: Propolis Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cyclomethicone, Cetearyl Olivate, Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Xanthan gum, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Zinc PCA, Betaine Salicylate, Mentha Haplocalix Extract, Menthyl Lactate, Citric Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid

name: SOME BY MI Yuja Niacin Brightening Moisture Gel Cream
description: Yuja Niacin Brightening Moisture Gel Cream is an excellent lightening cream for combating pigmentation, as well as giving radiance to the skin. The cream contains 90% Yuzu Extract, which is a hybrid of mandarin and lemon, and has a high concentration of vitamin C.
KeyIngredient: Niacinamide(5 %) · Thuja Orientalis Leaf Extract · Arbutin · Ascorbic Acid · Ascorbyl Glucoside

name: Round Lab Birch Juice Moisturizing Cream
description: A gentle, well-rounded moisturizer for total moisture care and skin barrier strengthening.
KeyIngredient: Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice(10,000ppm),Jojoba Esters,Panthenol

name: iUNIK Beta Glucan Daily Moisture Cream 60ml
description: LONG-LASTING HYDRATIN, FAST ABSORBING, MOISTURIZES DRY SKIN and IMPROVE SKIN BARRIER function with beta-glucan, centella asiatica extract, and Red Fruits Complex (Prunus, Raspberry, Strawberry, Peach, Punica) Helps soothe irritated skin, sun-burnt skin.
KeyIngredient: Niacinamide ; Antioxidant: Centella Asiatica Extract, Prunus Salicina Fruit Extract

name: Anua Heartleaf 70% Intense Calming Cream
description: Heartleaf 70% intense calming cream soothe the irritated skin, provide deep moisturization & strengthen skin barrier with mild ingredients
KeyIngredient: Houttuynia Cordata Extract (70%) · Cetearyl Alcohol · Glycerin · Cyclohexasiloxane · Butylene Glycol

name: Axis-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Cream
description: Meet the AXIS-Y Dark Spot Correcting Glow Cream - your go-to for deep hydration and dewy glow! With its unique gel-to-water texture, this cream delivers lightweight yet intense hydration that penetrates up to 15 layers deep, fortifying your skin barrier while fading dark spots. Pair it with our Glow Toner and Glow Serum for a simple, yet complete brightening routine to unveil your most radiant, healthy glow yet!
KeyIngredient: Water, Glycerin, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Alpha-arbutin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isohexadecane, Betaine, Ceramide NP, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Adenosine, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glutathione, Squalane, Allantoin, Asiaticoside, Centella Asiatica Extract,

name: Mary&May Sensitive Soothing Gel Blemish Cream
description: Mary&May Sensitive Soothing Gel Blemish Cream, 71.8% Houttuynia Cordata + 9.7% Tea tree extract, translucent gel type cream to soothe troubled and sensitive skin
KeyIngredient: HOUTTUYNIA CORDATA · TEA TREE EXTRACT · PANTHENOL.

name: Torriden BALANCEFUL Cica Cream
description: Bouncy Balancing Cream: A enriched cream with Centella Asiatica provides deep hydration, skin balancing, and soothing benefits.
KeyIngredient: Antioxidant: Centella Asiatica Extract (10,000Ppm), Asiaticoside, Madecassoside ; Cell-communicating ingredient

name: Torriden DIVE-IN Soothing Cream
description: [BOUNCY SOOTHING CREAM] Low Molecular Hyaluronic Acid Soothing Cream focuses on hydrating and soothing skin and preventing moisture loss. This moistuful gel cream absorbs quickly and deeply into your skin!
KeyIngredient: Allantoin · Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract · Panthenol · Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract

name: Tocobo Multi Ceramide Cream
description: Multi Ceramide Cream: The sherbet type of multi ceramide cream has a different feel from the creams you've seen so far! It is lightly absorbed into the skin, but you can see the moist skin even when you wake up the next day.
KeyIngredient: Purified Water, Glycerin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methyl Glucose Distearate, Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Distea Rate, Cyclohexasiloxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Chlorella Extract, Shea Butter, Hyaluronic Acid

name: Jumiso Snail Mucin 88 + Peptide Cream
description: CLINICALLY PROVEN, NON-COMEDOGENIC - SKIN PERFECTING REPAIR CREAM |  THE SKIN SAVIOR FOR TROUBLED SKIN
KeyIngredient: Snail Secretion Filtrate (88%), Niacinamide, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Water, Triethylhexanoin, Phenoxyethanol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Carbomer, Ethyl Hexanediol, Arginine, Allantoin, Sodium Polyacrylate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Panthenol, Adenosine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Copper Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7

name: AMPLE:N CeramideShot Cream
description: It is a high-moisture formulation and completes the barrier of layers on weak skin. Contains patented Arctigenin that has been proven to enhance skin barrier. Meltting cream cheese texture. It is a low-irritating mild cream that can be applied to all types of skin.
KeyIngredient: Anti-acne: Niacinamide ; Antioxidant: Forsythia Suspensa Fruit Extract ; Cell-communicating ingredient: Niacinamide, Adenosine.

name: Innisfree Green Tea Seed Cream
description: Those looking for a soothing skin barrier-enhancing cream to care for damages caused by moisture loss. Those with dry skin looking for a cream to restore skin moisture barrier.
KeyIngredient: Camellia Sinensis (green tea) Seed Oil and a range of humectants and emollients, including propanediol, glycerin and stearyl dimethicone.
